import React, { useRef } from "react"; import emailjs from "@emailjs/browser"; import "./contact.css"; const Contact = () => { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm( "service_5du60g6", "template_o2qi1rp", form.current, "wq1x5w9qM99HJ6GtZ" ); e.target.reset(); }; return (
